content.prompt: Given the class LinkedListExample, complete its method mergeLists that takes in a LinkedListExample objects and returns a single LinkedListExample object that combines the LinkedListExample object that called the mergeLists method with the method's input parameter.For example, mergeLists should return a list that combines these two LinkedListExample objects --LinkedListExample list1: ["hello", "there"]LinkedListExample list2: ["General", "Kenobi"]-- as follows: list1.mergeLists(list2);LinkedListExample returnedList: ["hello", "there", "General", "Kenobi"]

uses.used_by: Jordan Barria, Jordan Barria - University Of Pittsburgh
